EmailTemplate.subject: SBA Opens RRF Grants Today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: As a reminder, the SBA will begin accepting applications for the Restaurant Revitalization Fund grants starting on Monday, May 3, 2020, at 12:00 p.m. ET. You must register at sba.gov <[[https://www.sba.gov/funding-programs/loans/covid-19-relief-options/restaurant-revitalization-fund]]> before you can submit your application. Keep in mind that funding is available on a first come, first served basis, so we encourage you to begin the application process as soon as possible. NCR can help you access your statements showing 2020 vs. 2019 sales data upon your request as follows: Silver users:  - Statements pulled from the Silver Back Office are pre-formatted with the NCR logo. Click HERE <[[https://customercare.ncrsilver.com/community?searchQuery=Sales-Summary-Report&subscriptionNumber=A-S00001316]]> for instructions on how to access your data via Silver Back Office.  Aloha users: Statements can be pulled from Aloha Insight or via Aloha Manager or Configuration Center. If you would like your statement to be NCR branded, please pull the report(s) and e-mail them to Marketing.Hospitality@ncr.com <[[mailto:Marketing.Hospitality@ncr.com]]>.  The NCR branded statements will be e-mailed back to you.  Follow these steps to pull your statement(s) via Aloha Manager or Configuration Center: - Go to Reports > Aloha Point of Sale > Reports > Sales > Sales Summary - Highlight 1/1/2019 and 12/31/2019 - Select Print - The report will consolidate all days as one total for 2019 revenue - Repeat the same process for a report on 2020 revenue by changing the dates to 1/1/2020 and 12/31/2020 Please visit the NCR American Rescue Plan Act site <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/sba-smb-relief]]> if you have any questions about the Restaurant Revitalization Fund Program.
